column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////I ordered the special pumpkin bread french toast. The bread was thick and moist
column2: but not my ideal for french toast. That doesn't mean I didn't eat every bite of it
column3: though I probably wouldn't order it again. My dining companion ordered the berry pancakes
column4: which is what I really wanted but
column5: regretably I decided to get creative with pumpkin instead. His pancakes were perfect. Light and fluffy and covered with fresh berries. He shared so I wasn't completely deprived
column6: but I will go for the pancakes next time around
